title: JCR: Structure and Performance in a Violent Extremist Network: The Small World Solution
description: Paul Huth, editor of the Journal of Conflict Resolution, interviews author Michael Kenney about his article, "Structure and Performance in a Violent Extremist Network: The Small World Solution." Kenney discusses the research methods, challenges in the process, and future studies.
